author: yaM Labs, Inc.
description:
Unsuckify your meetings.

Have everything related to the meeting in one place, viewable and editable for everyone. Create and review tasks, post feedback on documents and use the powerful visual tools to structure the discussions.
Get value from every business meeting you run or attend.

* Capture all meetings-related information and put in a shared, realtime space
* Easy for your co-workers, partners and customers to pick up and use
* Flexible enough to use with any kind of projects and business processes  
* This will save you thousands on wasted workhours spent in inefficient meetings


Meetings. Love them or hate them, it’s unlikely you’ll do business without them. While meetings may have these good intentions, we all know the reality often tells a different story. And, with the time spent on meetings costing billions of dollars daily, it’s important to strive for maximum efficiency and effectiveness. People habitually complain about the quantity and quality of meetings, often because of a lack of understanding of meeting objectives, a lack of structure, a lack of cohesion, and a lack of clear follow-up actions. It’s little wonder why many people equate meetings with a waste of time.

Make Meetings Matter.


KEY FEATURES 

* Create meetings and invite people to collaborate with just a few clicks
* Everything is updated in real time - perfect for use during the meeting
* Works with any kind of meeting - face-to-face, conference call, web conference - client or internal
* Has quickly accessable tools for brainstorms, document review, diagram drawing, priority analysis and many more
* Covers the whole meeting lifecycle - from scheduling to minutes distribution to follow-ups
* Tracks all action items created during meetings and sends reminders
name: yaM - yet another Meeting
